Package io.tweetninja.cli.Util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ASCII
    ASCII is a utility class that I stole from the internet that, in essence, converts BufferedImages into colored ASCII.
    ConsoleColor
    ConsoleColor is a utility class with static strings that can be put into a console line to add some color.
    ConsoleCursor
    ConsoleCursor is a utility class that can manipulate the position of the console's write head.
    ConsoleDropdown
    ConsoleDropdown is a class that when given an array of options can later be called with ConsoleDropdown#read() to create an interactive prompt which returns the selected option the user chose.
    ConsoleDropdown.Option
    ConsoleDropdown.Option is a class that describes a selectable option to be used in a ConsoleDropdown
    ConsoleTable
    A utility class for generating ASCII tables on-the-fly.
    Countries
    Holds country data retrieved from country-regions/country-region-data on GitHub, or locally if this fails.
    Countries.Country
    A data object holding info about a country.
    Countries.Country.Region
    A data object holding info about a region within a country.
    Hardware
    Wrapper for getting hardware ids cross-platform.
    Hardware4Mac  
    Hardware4Misc  
    Hardware4Nix  
    Hardware4Win  
    License
    Helper class for authenticating and reviewing licenses.
    License.LicenseInfo
    Structure class for reading license info.
    MidiPlayback
    Utility class for playing MIDI sequences.
    NetClient
    A utility class that wraps HttpURLConnection to bring node-style networking to Java.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsoleTable.CellAlignment
    Describes the way text sits inside of a table cell.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Countries.CountryGatewayException
    Generic exception for when the country list fails to load.
    License.InvalidLicenseException
    Generic exception for when a license seems to be invalid.
    License.LicenseGatewayException
    Generic exception for when the license APIs return an unexpected result.
